    è¯¥ç‰ˆæœ¬æ˜¯ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¯ä»¥ä¸Šä¼ æ­Œæ›²çš„ï¼Œç„¶åå¯ä»¥æŸ¥çœ‹ä¸ªäººä¸Šä¼ çš„æ­Œæ›²ï¼Œä¸Šä¼ æ­Œæ›²åï¼Œç®¡ç†å‘˜è¿›è¡Œå®¡æ ¸ã€‚

    # 1.1. ç™»é™†åæ‰å¯ä»¥ä¸Šä¼ æ­Œæ›²

    # 1.2. å·²ä¸Šä¼ æ­Œæ›²æ¸…å•

    # 1.3. ä¸Šä¼ æ­Œæ›²

    ç‚¹å‡»æ·»åŠ æ­Œæ›²ï¼Œå½•å…¥æ­Œåã€æ­Œæ‰‹ã€ç®€ä»‹ã€æ­Œè¯åŠé€‰æ‹©æœ¬åœ°mp3æ­Œæ›²ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»ç¡®å®šå®Œæˆä¸Šä¼ ã€‚

    ç‚¹å‡»åˆ·æ–°ï¼Œå¯çœ‹åˆ°å·²ç»ä¸Šä¼ æˆåŠŸã€‚

    # 1.4. å®¡æ ¸åˆ—è¡¨

    ç™»é™†ç®¡ç†å‘˜åå°ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»æ­Œæ›²å®¡æ ¸ï¼Œå¯çœ‹åˆ°å·²æœ‰åˆšä¸Šä¼ çš„æ­Œæ›²åå¹´ï¼Œå¯å˜æ›´å›¾ç‰‡ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶å¯å®¡æ ¸é€šè¿‡å’Œæ‹’ç»ã€‚

    # 1.5. å®¡æ ¸é€šè¿‡

    ç‚¹å‡»é€šè¿‡ï¼Œå¼¹å‡ºæ­Œæ‰‹é€‰æ‹©ç•Œé¢ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©å¯¹åº”æ­Œæ‰‹ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»ç¡®å®šå³å¯å®Œæˆå®¡æ ¸

    # 1.6. å®¡æ ¸æ‹’ç»

    ç‚¹å‡»æ‹’ç»ï¼Œå¼¹å‡ºæ‹’ç»ç†ç”±å¡«å†™ç•Œé¢ï¼Œå½•å…¥å¯¹åº”ç†ç”±ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»ç¡®å®šï¼Œå®Œæˆæ­Œæ›²å®¡æ ¸æ‹’ç»ã€‚

    # 1.7. ä¸Šä¼ äººå®¡æ ¸ç»“æœæŸ¥çœ‹

    å®¡æ ¸é€šè¿‡çš„æ˜¾ç¤ºå®¡æ ¸é€šè¿‡ï¼Œå®¡æ ¸æ‹’ç»çš„æ˜¾ç¤ºå®¡æ ¸æ‹’ç»å¹¶å±•ç¤ºå®¡æ ¸æ„è§ã€‚

    # 1.8 åˆ¶ä½œé“ƒå£°

    é’ˆå¯¹æ­£åœ¨æ’­æ”¾çš„æ­Œæ›²ç‚¹å‡»åˆ¶ä½œé“ƒå£°ï¼Œå¯è¿›å…¥é“ƒå£°åˆ¶ä½œç•Œé¢

    æ³¨ï¼šç™»é™†åæ‰å¯ä»¥åˆ¶ä½œé“ƒå£°ï¼Œåªæœ‰æ­Œæ›²æ‰å¯ä»¥åˆ¶ä½œé“ƒå£°ï¼Œ

    # 1.9 é“ƒå£°åˆ¶ä½œ

    æ‹–åŠ¨å·¦å³æ—¶é—´å®šä½æˆ³ï¼Œç¡®å®šé“ƒå£°é•¿åº¦ï¼Œå¯ç‚¹å‡»æ’­æ”¾æŒ‰é’®åå¤æ’­æ”¾è°ƒæ•´ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»ç”Ÿæˆé“ƒå£°ã€‚

    å¡«å†™é“ƒå£°åç§°ï¼Œé“ƒå£°ç®€ä»‹ï¼Œé“ƒå£°å±•ç¤ºå›¾ç‰‡ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»ç¡®å®šï¼Œå³å¯å®Œæˆé“ƒå£°åˆ¶ä½œ

    # 1.10 é“ƒå£°åˆ¶ä½œåˆ—è¡¨

    æˆ‘çš„éŸ³ä¹->æˆ‘çš„é“ƒå£°ä¸­å¯æŸ¥çœ‹è‡ªå·±åˆ¶ä½œçš„é“ƒå£°ã€‚

    # 1.11 é“ƒå£°æµè§ˆ

    ç‚¹å‡»é“ƒå£°é¡µé¢ï¼Œå³å¯å·¦å³æµè§ˆå…¨ç½‘å·²åˆ¶ä½œçš„é“ƒå£°ï¼Œåˆ‡æ¢æ—¶ä¼šåŒæ­¥æ’­æ”¾é“ƒå£°

    # äºŒï¼Œè§†é¢‘å±•ç¤º

    å½“ç„¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœä½ æƒ³çœ‹åœ¨çº¿çš„ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥çœ‹ï¼š

    # ä¸‰ï¼Œæ ¸å¿ƒä»£ç å±•ç¤º

    @RestController
public class AdminController {

    @Autowired
    private AdminService adminService;

    /**
     * åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸ
     */
    @RequestMapping(value = "/admin/login/status",method = RequestMethod.POST)
    public Object loginStatus(HttpServletRequest request, HttpSession session){
        JSONObject jsonObject = new JSONObject();
        String name = request.getParameter("name");
        String password = request.getParameter("password");
        boolean flag = adminService.verifyPassword(name,password);
        if(flag){
            jsonObject.put(Consts.CODE,1);
            jsonObject.put(Consts.MSG,"ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸ");
            session.setAttribute(Consts.NAME,name);
            return jsonObject;
        }
        jsonObject.put(Consts.CODE,0);
        jsonObject.put(Consts.MSG,"ç”¨æˆ·åæˆ–å¯†ç é”™è¯¯");
        return jsonObject;
    }
}



    /**
 * æ”¶è—æ§åˆ¶ç±»
 */
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/collect")
public class CollectController {

    @Autowired
    private CollectService CollectService;

    @Autowired
    private SongService songService;

    /**
     * æ·»åŠ æ”¶è—
     */
    @RequestMapping(value = "/add",method = RequestMethod.POST)
    public Object addCollect(HttpServletRequest request){
        JSONObject jsonObject = new JSONObject();
        String userId = request.getParameter("userId");           //ç”¨æˆ·id
        String type = request.getParameter("type");               //æ”¶è—ç±»å‹ï¼ˆ0æ­Œæ›²1æ­Œå•ï¼‰
        String songId = request.getParameter("songId");           //æ­Œæ›²id
        if(songId==null||songId.equals("")){
            jsonObject.put(Consts.CODE,0);
            jsonObject.put(Consts.MSG,"æ”¶è—æ­Œæ›²ä¸ºç©º");
            return jsonObject;
        }
        if(CollectService.existSongId(Integer.parseInt(userId),Integer.parseInt(songId))){
            boolean status = CollectService.deleteByUserIdSongId(Integer.parseInt(userId), Integer.parseInt(songId));
            if (status) {
                jsonObject.put(Consts.CODE,2);
                jsonObject.put(Consts.MSG,"å–æ¶ˆæ”¶è—");
            }
            return jsonObject;
        }

        //ä¿å­˜åˆ°æ”¶è—çš„å¯¹è±¡ä¸­
        Collect Collect = new Collect();
        Collect.setUserId(Integer.parseInt(userId));
        Collect.setType(new Byte(type));
        Collect.setSongId(Integer.parseInt(songId));

        boolean flag = CollectService.insert(Collect);
        if(flag){   //ä¿å­˜æˆåŠŸ
            jsonObject.put(Consts.CODE,1);
            jsonObject.put(Consts.MSG,"æ”¶è—æˆåŠŸ");
            return jsonObject;
        }
        jsonObject.put(Consts.CODE,0);
        jsonObject.put(Consts.MSG,"æ”¶è—å¤±è´¥");
        return jsonObject;
    }

    /**
     * åˆ é™¤æ”¶è—
     */
    @RequestMapping(value = "/delete",method = RequestMethod.GET)
    public Object deleteCollect(HttpServletRequest request){
        String userId = request.getParameter("userId");           //ç”¨æˆ·id
        String songId = request.getParameter("songId");           //æ­Œæ›²id
        boolean flag = CollectService.deleteByUserIdSongId(Integer.parseInt(userId),Integer.parseInt(songId));
        return flag;
    }

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢æ‰€æœ‰æ”¶è—
     */
    @RequestMapping(value = "/allCollect",method = RequestMethod.GET)
    public Object allCollect(HttpServletRequest request){
        return CollectService.allCollect();
    }

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢æŸä¸ªç”¨æˆ·çš„æ”¶è—åˆ—è¡¨
     */
    @RequestMapping(value = "/collectOfUserId",method = RequestMethod.GET)
    public Object collectOfUserId(HttpServletRequest request){
        String userId = request.getParameter("userId");          //ç”¨æˆ·id
        return CollectService.collectOfUserId(Integer.parseInt(userId));
    }

    /**
     * è·å–æ­Œæ›²çš„æ”¶è—é‡
     */
    @RequestMapping(value = "/getCollectCount",method = RequestMethod.GET)
    public Object getCollectCount(@RequestParam("userId") Integer userId) {
        List<Collect> collectList = CollectService.getCollectCount(userId);
        for (Collect collect : collectList) {
            List<Song> song = songService.getSongId(collect.getSongId());
            collect.setSongs(song);
        }
        return collectList;
    }



    /**
 * æ­Œæ›²ç®¡ç†controller
 */
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/song")
public class SongController {

    @Autowired
    private SongService songService;

    /**
     * æ·»åŠ æ­Œæ›²
     */
    @RequestMapping(value = "/add",method = RequestMethod.POST)
    public Object addSong(HttpServletRequest request, @RequestParam("file")MultipartFile mpFile, @RequestParam("files")MultipartFile mvFile){
        JSONObject jsonObject = new JSONObject();
        //è·å–å‰ç«¯ä¼ æ¥çš„å‚æ•°
        String singerId = request.getParameter("singerId").trim();  //æ‰€å±æ­Œæ‰‹id
        String name = request.getParameter("name").trim();          //æ­Œå
        String introduction = request.getParameter("introduction").trim();          //ç®€ä»‹
        String pic = "/img/songPic/tubiao.jpg";                     //é»˜è®¤å›¾ç‰‡
        String lyric = request.getParameter("lyric").trim();     //æ­Œè¯
        //ä¸Šä¼ æ­Œæ›²æ–‡ä»¶
        if(mpFile.isEmpty()){
            jsonObject.put(Consts.CODE,0);
            jsonObject.put(Consts.MSG,"æ­Œæ›²ä¸Šä¼ å¤±è´¥");
            return jsonObject;
        }
        //æ–‡ä»¶å=å½“å‰æ—¶é—´åˆ°æ¯«ç§’+åŸæ¥çš„æ–‡ä»¶å
        String fileName = System.currentTimeMillis()+mpFile.getOriginalFilename();
        //æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
        String filePath = System.getProperty("user.dir")+System.getProperty("file.separator")+"song";
        //å¦‚æœæ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ–°å¢è¯¥è·¯å¾„
        File file1 = new File(filePath);
        if(!file1.exists()){
            file1.mkdir();
        }
        //å®é™…çš„æ–‡ä»¶åœ°å€
        File dest = new File(filePath+System.getProperty("file.separator")+fileName);
        //å­˜å‚¨åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“é‡Œçš„ç›¸å¯¹æ–‡ä»¶åœ°å€
        String storeUrlPath = "/song/"+fileName;
        try {
            mpFile.transferTo(dest);
            Song song = new Song();
            song.setSingerId(Integer.parseInt(singerId));
            song.setName(name);
            song.setIntroduction(introduction);
            song.setPic(pic);
            song.setLyric(lyric);
            song.setUrl(storeUrlPath);
            if(!mvFile.isEmpty()){
            	//æ–‡ä»¶å=å½“å‰æ—¶é—´åˆ°æ¯«ç§’+åŸæ¥çš„æ–‡ä»¶å
                String fileNames = System.currentTimeMillis()+mvFile.getOriginalFilename();
                //æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
                String filePaths = System.getProperty("user.dir")+System.getProperty("file.separator")+"mv";
                //å¦‚æœæ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ–°å¢è¯¥è·¯å¾„
                File file2 = new File(filePaths);
                if(!file2.exists()){
                    file2.mkdir();
                }
                //å®é™…çš„æ–‡ä»¶åœ°å€
                File dests = new File(filePaths+System.getProperty("file.separator")+fileNames);
                mvFile.transferTo(dests);
                //å­˜å‚¨åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“é‡Œçš„ç›¸å¯¹æ–‡ä»¶åœ°å€
                String storeUrlPaths = "/mv/"+fileNames;
                song.setMvurl(storeUrlPaths);
            }
            boolean flag = songService.insert(song);
            if(flag){
                jsonObject.put(Consts.CODE,1);
                jsonObject.put(Consts.MSG,"ä¿å­˜æˆåŠŸ");
                jsonObject.put("avator",storeUrlPath);
                return jsonObject;
            }
            jsonObject.put(Consts.CODE,0);
            jsonObject.put(Consts.MSG,"ä¿å­˜å¤±è´¥");
            return jsonObject;
        } catch (IOException e) {
            jsonObject.put(Consts.CODE,0);
            jsonObject.put(Consts.MSG,"ä¿å­˜å¤±è´¥"+e.getMessage());
        }finally {
            return jsonObject;
        }
    }


    **
 * æ­Œå•çš„æ­Œæ›²ç®¡ç†controller
 */
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/listSong")
public class ListSongController {

    @Autowired
    private ListSongService listSongService;

    /**
     * ç»™æ­Œå•æ·»åŠ æ­Œæ›²
     */
    @RequestMapping(value = "/add", method = RequestMethod.POST)
    public Object addListSong(HttpServletRequest request) {
        JSONObject jsonObject = new JSONObject();
        //è·å–å‰ç«¯ä¼ æ¥çš„å‚æ•°
        String songId = request.getParameter("songId").trim();  //æ­Œæ›²id
        Integer songListId = Integer.valueOf(request.getParameter("songListId").trim()); //æ­Œå•id
        List<ListSong> listSongs = listSongService.selectBySongId(songId);

        for (ListSong listSong : listSongs) {
            Integer id = listSong.getId();
            ListSong songlist = listSongService.selectByPrimaryKey(id);
            if (songlist.getSongListId().equals(songListId)) {
                jsonObject.put(Consts.CODE, 0);
                jsonObject.put(Consts.MSG, "æ·»åŠ å¤±è´¥ï¼ŒåŸå› æ˜¯ï¼šæ­Œæ›²é‡å¤");
                return jsonObject;
            }
        }
        ListSong listSong1 = new ListSong();
        listSong1.setSongId(Integer.parseInt(songId));
        listSong1.setSongListId(songListId);
        boolean flag = listSongService.insert(listSong1);
        if (flag) {
            jsonObject.put(Consts.CODE, 1);
            jsonObject.put(Consts.MSG, "ä¿å­˜æˆåŠŸ");
            return jsonObject;
        } else {
            jsonObject.put(Consts.CODE, 0);
            jsonObject.put(Consts.MSG, "ä¿å­˜å¤±è´¥");
        }

        return jsonObject;

    }

    /**
     * æ ¹æ®æ­Œå•idæŸ¥è¯¢æ­Œæ›²
     */
    @RequestMapping(value = "/detail", method = RequestMethod.GET)
    public Object detail(HttpServletRequest request) {
        String songListId = request.getParameter("songListId");
        return listSongService.listSongOfSongListId(Integer.parseInt(songListId));
    }

    /**
     * åˆ é™¤æ­Œå•é‡Œçš„æ­Œæ›²
     */
    @RequestMapping(value = "/delete", method = RequestMethod.GET)
    public Object delete(HttpServletRequest request) {
        String songId = request.getParameter("songId").trim();                 //æ­Œæ›²id
        String songListId = request.getParameter("songListId").trim();        //æ­Œå•id
        boolean flag = listSongService.deleteBySongIdAndSongListId(Integer.parseInt(songId), Integer.parseInt(songListId));
        return flag;
    }

    åŸºäºæ¨èç®—æ³•çš„å•†åŸç³»ç»Ÿå¼€å‘ï¸ æ‰‹æŠŠæ‰‹æ•™ä½ è®¾è®¡ä¸€ä¸ªCSDNç³»ç»Ÿï¸
